statements: SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM health_records WHERE insurance_provider = 'BlueCross';
SELECT * FROM health_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM health_records WHERE coverage_plan = 'Gold';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM health_records WHERE insurance_provider LIKE 'Aetna%';
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM health_records WHERE insurance_provider = 'Blue Cross';
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, coverage_plan FROM health_records WHERE patient_id IN (2, 3, 4) ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, insurance_provider FROM health_records GROUP BY insurance_provider HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM PatientRecords WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, gender, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM HealthInsurancePlans WHERE deductible < 5000 AND coverage_amount > 1000 ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM PatientRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%fever%';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM PatientRecords WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY age ASC, name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_of_visit FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT plan_name, coverage_amount FROM InsurancePlans WHERE deductible < 5000;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM MedicalHistory WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT plan_name, deductible FROM InsurancePlans WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY deductible DESC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM Patients p JOIN InsurancePlans i ON p.patient_id = i.plan_id WHERE i.copay_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Covid%';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT plan_name, coverage_details FROM insurance_plans;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;

SELECT patients.name, health_records.diagnosis, health_records.treatment FROM patients JOIN health_records ON patients.patient_id = health_records.patient_id WHERE health_records.date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patients.name ASC;

SELECT patients.name, insurance_plans.plan_name, coverage_history.start_date, coverage_history.end_date FROM patients JOIN coverage_history ON patients.patient_id = coverage_history.patient_id JOIN insurance_plans ON coverage_history.plan_id = insurance_plans.plan_id WHERE coverage_history.end_date IS NULL ORDER BY insurance_plans.plan_name DESC;

SELECT patients.name, COUNT(coverage_history.coverage_id) AS total_coverage FROM patients LEFT JOIN coverage_history ON patients.patient_id = coverage_history.patient_id GROUP BY patients.name HAVING total_coverage > 3 ORDER BY total_coverage DESC, patients.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'AB';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_claim_amount FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'A';
SELECT Patients.patient_id, Patients.patient_name, HealthRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, CoverageHistory.start_date, InsurancePlans.plan_name FROM Patients JOIN CoverageHistory ON Patients.patient_id = CoverageHistory.patient_id JOIN InsurancePlans ON CoverageHistory.plan_id = InsurancePlans.plan_id;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Claims.claim_date, Claims.amount, Claims.status FROM Patients JOIN Claims ON Patients.patient_id = Claims.patient_id WHERE Claims.amount > 1000;
